txt.en: Smaug's bones are in the water, in Esgaroth-of-old.\n\nYou should find a good vantage place to inspect Smaug's bones.
Lake-town can be found in the Dale-lands.\n\nYou should look for anyone in Lake-town who is concerned with Smaug's bones.

'Those were Men of Mordor, then? But look, a raft approaches from across the water. Can you see the occupant? He is dressed as those men were, and by his bearing, I guess he is their leader.\n\n'I wonder what he might tell us of this dark plot we have found here, if we brave standing before him.'
Travel to Lake-town
TBD
You should investigate the strange pile on one of the rafts in Esgaroth-of-old.
Search for talk of Smaug's bones
'Yes, you heard me a-right. Leave Smaug's bones where they lie! Don't tell me you're in favour of this madcap plan?'
You should travel to Lake-town, north of Esgaroth-of-old.
TBD
Investigate the strange pile on the raft
Talk to Skerri
The unruly crowd can be found in Lake-town.\n\nYou should find out why someone in the unruly crowd spoke the name of Smaug.
Now, is there any talk here of Smaug's bones?
You hear the name 'Smaug' shouted by someone in an unruly group
'Even in mine own defeat, Lake-town shall succeed!'
Thorlind has spotted a raft bearing a man who might be the leader of this strange plot, approaching Esgaroth.
In his defeat, Burudâur mentioned yet another scheme... in Lake-town!
Smaug's Remains

You tell Thorlind of Burudâur's words and all you saw. He ponders deeply.\n\n'I see. It sounds as if there is some other scheme afoot, somewhere in Lake-town. There we have another piece of the puzzle, and yet I still cannot guess at the whole! Will you go to Lake-town and uncover what you may? I must report back to Felegoth without delay, and your swift action might prevent whatever harm is planned.'
You should talk to Thorlind, who can be found just outside of Esgaroth-of-old.
<rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> at the Bones of Smaug
This is a good place to <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> at the Bones of Smaug
Among the shouts of an unruly mob, you catch the word 'Smaug'
Smaug's bones remain unmoved
Talk to Thorlind
Confront Burudâur
You should confront the leader of the excavation, who is located on a raft at the edge of Esgaroth-of-old.
It is a pile of... rust?
TBD Weeping Warrior 5
